data.content: Crea un chatbot para hacer reservas de hoteles.

To create a chatbot for hotel reservations using Taskyto, we will need to define several modules, including a top-level menu, data gathering modules for collecting user information, and possibly action modules for processing reservations. Below is the complete YAML content for the chatbot.

### Top-Level Menu
This module will serve as the entry point for the chatbot.

```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to the Hotel Reservation Chatbot! I can help you book a room at our hotel. 
    Please let me know how I can assist you.
  fallback: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Make a reservation
    kind: module
    reference: reservation
  - title: Frequently Asked Questions
    kind: module
    reference: faq
  - title: Welcome Message
    kind: answer
    answer: |
      Hello! I'm here to assist you with your hotel reservations. What would you like to do today?
```

### Reservation Module
This module will gather the necessary information for making a reservation.

```yaml
# -----> File: reservation.yaml <-----
name: reservation
kind: data_gathering
description: |
  Please provide the details for your hotel reservation, including your name, check-in date, check-out date, 
  and the number of guests. All fields are required to complete your reservation.
data:
  - name: Guest Name
  - check_in_date: date
  - check_out_date: date
  - number_of_guests:
      type: integer

on-success:
  response:
    text: "Thank you, {name}. Your reservation from {check_in_date} to {check_out_date} for {number_of_guests} guests has been successfully made!"
    rephrase: simple
```

### FAQ Module
This module will provide answers to common questions.

```yaml
# -----> File: faq.yaml <-----
name: faq
kind: question_answering
description: Answers to frequently asked questions about the hotel.
questions:
- question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
  answer: Check-in is at 3 PM and check-out is at 11 AM.
- question: Do you offer free Wi-Fi?
  answer: Yes, we provide complimentary Wi-Fi for all guests.
- question: Is breakfast included in the room rate?
  answer: Yes, breakfast is included in your stay.
- question: What is your cancellation policy?
  answer: You can cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before check-in without any charges.
```

This YAML content defines a basic structure for a hotel reservation chatbot. You can expand upon this by adding more modules, such as payment processing or room selection, as needed. Let me know if you need further assistance or additional features!
